title: Professional Language Proficiency Enhancement Course Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of fundamental terminology across disciplines
context.additional_context: Curriculum focused on professionals in medical/legal/technical fields enhancing work efficiency and language communication skills through generative AI

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to draft specialized documents (diagnostic reports, contracts, technical reports, etc.) across fields using generative AI tools.
Learners apply criteria to evaluate the accuracy and ethical appropriateness of AI-generated content.
Learners acquire problem-solving skills to identify and correct errors occurring during collaboration with AI.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
